thread.title: Amazon's celebrating its excellence with a discount on nearly everything
thread.title_full: Amazon's celebrating its excellence with a discount on nearly everything

author: cbennett@dailydot.com (Colette Bennett)
title: Amazon's celebrating its excellence with a discount on nearly everything
text:
Illustration by Jason Reed Amazon wants to thank us all today. 
Tuesday morning Amazon announced exciting news : The company ranked higher in the annual Harris Corporate Reputation Poll in 2017 than it had over the past 18 years, spending its second year at #1. To celebrate, founder Jeff Bezos has announced a discount for nearly everything on the entire website. 
By using the code BIGTHANKS , you can get $8.62 (a nod to the Harris rating of 86.27) on any order over $50 on the website today. The bad news is that it does not apply to digital content, video games (sorry gamers), or Amazon Gift Cards. The good news is, that leaves everything else â€” which is quite a bit to choose from. 
The deal is good until midnight tonight, so you may as well go clean out your wish list.
